Constructors

TextBox() 

protected TextBox()

Fields

LengthLimit

Maximum allowed length of text.

public int? LengthLimit

Field Value

int?

Remarks

Any input beyond this limit will be dropped and then NotifyInputError() will be called.

Placeholder 

protected SpriteText Placeholder

Field Value

SpriteText

Properties

AcceptsFocus

If true, we will gain focus (receiving priority on keyboard input) (and receive an OnFocus(FocusEvent) event) on returning true in OnClick(ClickEvent).

public override bool AcceptsFocus { get; }

Property Value

bool

AllowClipboardExport

Whether clipboard copying functionality is allowed.

protected virtual bool AllowClipboardExport { get; }

Property Value

bool

AllowIme

Whether to allow IME input when this text box has input focus.

protected virtual bool AllowIme { get; }

Property Value

bool

Examples

Useful for situations where IME input is not wanted, such as for passwords, numbers, or romanised text.

Remarks

This is just a hint to the native implementation, some might respect this, while others will ignore and always have the IME (dis)allowed.

AllowWordNavigation

Whether seeking to word boundaries is allowed.

protected virtual bool AllowWordNavigation { get; }

Property Value

bool

CanBeTabbedTo

Whether this TabbableContainer<T> can be tabbed to.

public override bool CanBeTabbedTo { get; }

Property Value

bool

CommitOnFocusLost

Whether a commit should be triggered whenever the textbox loses focus.

public bool CommitOnFocusLost { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Current

Gets or sets the Bindable<T> that provides the current value.

public Bindable<string> Current { get; set; }

Property Value

Bindable<string>

Remarks

A provided Bindable<T> will be bound to, rather than be stored internally.

FontSize

A fixed size for the text displayed in this TextBox. If left unset, text size will be computed based on the dimensions of the TextBox.

public float FontSize { get; init; }

Property Value

float

HandleLeftRightArrows

Whether this TextBox should accept left and right arrow keys for navigation.

public virtual bool HandleLeftRightArrows { get; }

Property Value

bool

HandleNonPositionalInput

Whether this Drawable handles non-positional input. This value is true by default if Handle(UIEvent) or any non-positional (e.g. keyboard related) "On-" input methods are overridden.

public override bool HandleNonPositionalInput { get; }

Property Value

bool

ImeCompositionActive

Whether there is a ongoing IME composition.

protected bool ImeCompositionActive { get; }

Property Value

bool

Remarks

The IME should take full input priority, as a lot of the common text editing keys/shortcuts are used internally in the IME for compositing. Full data about the composition events is processed by handleImeComposition(string, int, int) "passively" so we shouldn't take any action on key events we receive.

LeftRightPadding

Padding to be used within the TextContainer. Requires special handling due to the sideways scrolling of text content.

protected virtual float LeftRightPadding { get; }

Property Value

float

DeleteBy(int)

If there is a selection, delete the selected text. Otherwise, delete characters from the cursor position by the signed amount. A negative amount represents a backward deletion, and a positive amount represents a forward deletion.

protected void DeleteBy(int amount)

Parameters

amount int

Parameters

userEvent bool

Whether this was invoked from a user action. Set to true to have OnImeResult(string, bool) invoked.

Remarks

Must only be called from the update thread.

OnCaretMoved(bool)

Invoked whenever the caret has moved from its position.

protected virtual void OnCaretMoved(bool selecting)

Parameters

selecting bool

Whether the caret is selecting text while moving.

OnClick(ClickEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.MouseButton is clicked on this Drawable.

protected override bool OnClick(ClickEvent e)

Parameters

e ClickEvent

The ClickEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawables that received a previous OnMouseDown(MouseDownEvent) invocation which are still present in the input queue (via BuildPositionalInputQueue(Vector2, List<Drawable>)) when the click occurs.
This will not occur if a drag was started (OnDragStart(DragStartEvent) was invoked) or a double-click occurred (OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent) was invoked).

OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.MouseButton is double-clicked on this Drawable.

protected override bool OnDoubleClick(DoubleClickEvent e)

Parameters

e DoubleClickEvent

The DoubleClickEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the next OnClick(ClickEvent) event from occurring.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawable that returned 

true
from a previous OnClick(ClickEvent) invocation.

OnDrag(DragEvent)

An event that occurs every time the mouse moves while dragging this Drawable.

protected override void OnDrag(DragEvent e)

Parameters

e DragEvent

The DragEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawable that returned 

true
from a previous OnDragStart(DragStartEvent) invocation.

OnDragStart(DragStartEvent)

An event that occurs when the mouse starts dragging on this Drawable.

protected override bool OnDragStart(DragStartEvent e)

Parameters

e DragStartEvent

The DragEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

OnFocus(FocusEvent)

An event that occurs when this Drawable gains focus.

protected override void OnFocus(FocusEvent e)

Parameters

e FocusEvent

The FocusEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawable that returned 

true
from both AcceptsFocus and a previous OnClick(ClickEvent) invocation.

OnFocusLost(FocusLostEvent)

An event that occurs when this Drawable loses focus.

protected override void OnFocusLost(FocusLostEvent e)

Parameters

e FocusLostEvent

The FocusLostEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This will only be invoked on the Drawable that previously had focus (OnFocus(FocusEvent) was invoked).

OnImeComposition(string, int, int, bool)

Invoked whenever the IME composition has changed.

protected virtual void OnImeComposition(string newComposition, int removedTextLength, int addedTextLength, bool selectionMoved)

Parameters

newComposition string

The current text of the composition.

removedTextLength int

The number of characters that have been replaced by new ones.

addedTextLength int

The number of characters that have replaced the old ones.

selectionMoved bool

Whether the selection/caret has moved.

OnImeResult(string, bool)

Invoked when the IME has finished compositing.

protected virtual void OnImeResult(string result, bool successful)

Parameters

result string

The result of the composition.

successful bool

Whether this composition was finished trough normal means (eg. user normally finished compositing trough the IME). false if ended prematurely.

OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.Key is pressed.

protected override bool OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent e)

Parameters

e KeyDownEvent

The KeyDownEvent containing information about the input event.

Returns

bool

Whether to block the event from propagating to other Drawables in the hierarchy.

Remarks

Repeat events can only be invoked on the Drawables that received a previous non-repeat OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent) invocation which are still present in the input queue (via BuildNonPositionalInputQueue(List<Drawable>, bool)) when the repeat occurs.

OnKeyUp(KeyUpEvent)

An event that occurs when a osuTK.Input.Key is released.

protected override void OnKeyUp(KeyUpEvent e)

Parameters

e KeyUpEvent

The KeyUpEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This is guaranteed to be invoked if OnKeyDown(KeyDownEvent) was invoked.

Returns

protected override void OnMouseUp(MouseUpEvent e)

Parameters

e MouseUpEvent

The MouseUpEvent containing information about the input event.

Remarks

This is guaranteed to be invoked if OnMouseDown(MouseDownEvent) was invoked.

Parameters

e KeyBindingPressEvent<PlatformAction>

Returns

bool

True if this Drawable handled the event. If false, then the event is propagated up the scene graph to the next eligible Drawable.

OnReleased(KeyBindingReleaseEvent<PlatformAction>)

Triggered when an action is released.

public virtual void OnReleased(KeyBindingReleaseEvent<PlatformAction> e)

Parameters

e KeyBindingReleaseEvent<PlatformAction>

The event containing information about the released action.

OnTextCommitted(bool)

Invoked whenever a text string has been committed to the textbox.

protected virtual void OnTextCommitted(bool textChanged)

Parameters

textChanged bool

Whether the current text string is different than the last committed.

OnTextDeselected()

Invoked whenever selected text is deselected. For selection, see OnTextSelectionChanged(TextSelectionType).

protected virtual void OnTextDeselected()

OnTextSelectionChanged(TextSelectionType)

Invoked whenever text selection changes. For deselection, see OnTextDeselected().

protected virtual void OnTextSelectionChanged(TextBox.TextSelectionType selectionType)

Parameters

selectionType TextBox.TextSelectionType

The type of selection change that occured.

OnUserTextAdded(string)

Invoked when new text is added via user input.

protected virtual void OnUserTextAdded(string added)

Parameters

added string

The text which was added.

OnUserTextRemoved(string)

Invoked when text is removed via user input.

protected virtual void OnUserTextRemoved(string removed)

Parameters

removed string

The text which was removed.

RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry)

Invoked to register dependency activation functions for this object.

public override void RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry registry)

Parameters

registry IDependencyActivatorRegistry

The IDependencyActivatorRegistry to register activation functions with.

SelectAll()

Selects all text in this TextBox. Focus must be acquired before calling this method.

public bool SelectAll()

Returns

bool

Whether text has been selected successfully. Returns false if the text box does not have focus.

Update()

Performs a once-per-frame update specific to this Drawable. A more elegant alternative to OnUpdate when deriving from Drawable. Note, that this method is always called before Drawables further down the scene graph are updated.

protected override void Update()

UpdateAfterChildren()

An opportunity to update state once-per-frame after Update() has been called for all InternalChildren. This is invoked prior to any autosize calculations of this CompositeDrawable.

protected override void UpdateAfterChildren()

Events

OnCommit

Fired whenever text is committed via a user action. This usually happens on pressing enter, but can also be triggered on focus loss automatically, via CommitOnFocusLost.

public event TextBox.OnCommitHandler OnCommit

Event Type

TextBox.OnCommitHandler
